subject: Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: I am amazed that there has not been a public players’ rebuke of Donald Fehr, considering the number of baseball giants once destined for Cooperstown who may become outsiders, forever.
snippet: I am amazed that there has not been a public players’ rebuke of Donald Fehr, considering the number of baseball giants once destined for Cooperstown who may become outsiders, forever.
